sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>sick</radical> <radical>Death Star</radical> needs its <radical>heart</radical> <kanji>cure</kanji>d. If it doesn't get <kanji>healing</kanji> soon, it will die.
meaningInfo: Maybe the Death Star wouldn't be sick if it wasn't so mean to you, yelling at you for living in a yurt, when it was a yurt on the inside the whole time. Wait! I know the cure!
readingMnemonic: You realized that the only way to <kanji>cure</kanji> the Death Star is to turn it back into a <reading>yu</reading>rt (<ja>ゆ</ja>). Then it won't be able to do any more harm, and its outside will reflect its pleasant self on the inside!
readingInfo: Hmm, but does this type of yurt healing technology exist?! You'll have to find out to cure it!!
